p:
The cumulative incidence of viral infections was 57.9% (95% CI=56.1–59.7) in allo-HCT patients, and 4.8% in auto-HCT patients (95% CI=3.4–6.2) ( p<0.001) ( Figure 1A). Due to the small number of infections in the auto-HCT setting, these data were excluded from further analysis and are presented in
Supplementary Table 1 .
